description: Retrieves information about a specific blueprint for OpenSearch Ingestion. Blueprints are templates for the configuration needed for a CreatePipeline request. For more information, see Using blueprints to create a pipeline.

parameters.name: BlueprintName
parameters.description: The name of the blueprint to retrieve.

nested_items.name: Blueprint
nested_items.description: The requested blueprint in YAML format.

nested_items.name: PipelineConfigurationBody
nested_items.description: The YAML configuration of the blueprint.

nested_items.name: DisplayName
nested_items.description: The display name of the blueprint.

nested_items.name: Service
nested_items.description: The name of the service that the blueprint is associated with.

nested_items.name: UseCase
nested_items.description: The use case that the blueprint relates to.
